content: --भानु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} of a variegated colour, shining with light. (--नुः {1} fire. {2} the sun; (चित्रभानुर्विभातीति दिने रवौ रात्रौ वह्नौ <ls>K. P. 2</ls> given as an instance of one of the modes of अंजन). {3} <ab>N.</ab> of Bhairava. {4} the Arka plant. {5} Śiva. {6} an epithet of the Aśvins. {7} the first year of the first cycle of Jupiter.
